September 2014 to December 2016 Subject matter expert on Network Appliance 7mode to CDOT migrations Designed and implemented migration processes and planning efforts to migrate and restructure data in enterprise environments Provided services for unique data sets requiring hostbased migrations using RSYNC ROBOCOPY and Secure Copy Changed storage environments file security from UNIX and Mixed Mode to contiguous NTFS security style storage environments using AD passthrough authentication Created run books for migration design implementation and processes Preformed migrations from 7mode to CDOT supporting storage infrastructures at data centers and customer locations Services included maintenance troubleshooting data capacity performance and installations Subject matter expert for Snap manager for Exchange SQL and On command Services also included integration and deployment of VMware Provided training for customers on SMSQL SME and Oncommand SELECT CERTIFICATIONS Hitachi Data
